    • Constructor Detail

      • Navigation

        public Navigation(Odometer odometer)

    • Method Detail

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y)
        This method makes the robot navigate to the desired coordinates, within a range of error.
        Parameters:
        x - Position desired in x
        y - Position desired in y

      • travelToMapCoordinates

        public void travelToMapCoordinates(double x,
                                   double y)
        This method calls the travelTo method, but converting the inputs from a point coordinate on the map to (x,y) coordinates in cm.
        Parameters:
        x - X component of the point coordinate
        y - Y component of the point coordinate

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double theta,
                   boolean wait)
        Turns to a desired orientation by the minimum angle.
        Parameters:
        theta - The angle at which it needs to turn to. Theta is in radians.
        wait - Boolean to set if the method waits until the rotation is complete before returning. True sets it to wait. False sets it to not wait.

      • turnToDesiredTheta

        public void turnToDesiredTheta()
        This method turns to the desired theta, which is the minimal angle to reach a destination.

      • isNavigating

        public boolean isNavigating()
        Returns whether turnTo is running, or travelTo is running and isn't pausing until the path is clear.
        Returns:
        Returns true if navigating, false if not.

      • thetaInRange

        public boolean thetaInRange(double bandWidth,
                            double trueTheta)
        Returns true if trueTheta is within a range. The range is determined by the current position in relation to x and y, plus or minus the bandwidth.
        Parameters:
        bandWidth - Range of error in theta accepted.
        trueTheta - Inputs the heading that needs to be checked if it is in range.
        Returns:
        Returns true if theta is in range, false otherwise.

      • getDesiredTheta

        public double getDesiredTheta()
        Compute the optimal angle to reach a point (x,y).
        Returns:
        Returns the desired theta.

      • turnAround

        public void turnAround(boolean clockwise)
        Method to turn around for 360 degrees.
        Parameters:
        clockwise - Turns clockwise if true. Turns counterclockwise if false.

      • setAcceleration

        public void setAcceleration(int acceleration)
        Set the acceleration of the motors.
        Parameters:
        acceleration - Set acceleration of the motors to this input value. Default acceleration if the input is -1.

      • turnAround

        public void turnAround(boolean clockwise,
                       boolean start,
                       int speed)
        Method to turn around at a custom speed (forever) until it is called to stop.
        Parameters:
        clockwise - Turns clockwise if true. Turns counterclockwise if false.
        start - Starts turning if true, stops turning if false.
        speed - Desired turning speed.

      • goForward

        public void goForward(double distance)
        Go forward for a specified distance.
        Parameters:
        distance - Distance to go forward in cm. Negative distance will go backwards.

      • goBackward

        public void goBackward(boolean start)
        Go backward (forever) until it is called again to stop.
        Parameters:
        start - Starts going backward if true, stops if false.
